text:
After some time they come back. They are slightly wounded but seem to be in good spirits. "That's better," says the red-bearded one. "Now I've worked up a sweat."

"A sweat?" guffaws one. "Why, Torsvald, you must be getting old, by golly, if fighting little assassins gets you winded!"

"Ho," laughs Torsvald, "maybe I am, but maybe it's not sweat at all but the grease off those slippery little runts, eh?"

This looks like a good moment to ambush them. You dislodge the grille and it falls on Torsvald's head. Too bad it didn't hit a vital spot. You drop in their midst. You are able to strike before they can collect their wits to fight.
